articles.author: Rami Musa | AP
articles.title: Hifter's forces say they'll abide by Libya ceasefire deal
articles.description: Libya's east-based forces have announced that they will abide by a ceasefire brokered by Russia and Turkey
articles.content: A spokesman for the self-styled Libyan Arab Armed Forces, which are led by ex-general Khalifa Hifter, said in a video statement that the ceasefire would take effect starting early Sunday. Spokesman Ahmed al-Mosmari said any violations of the ceasefire by thei… [+2501 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Drone flies over pedophile cardinal's Australian prison
articles.description: A newspaper reports disgraced Cardinal George Pell has been transferred from a Melbourne prison after a drone illegally flew overhead in a suspected attempt to photograph the famous inmate
articles.content:
The move came after a drone flew over a prison garden where Pope Francis former finance minister is employed weeding and watering plants, the newspaper reported.
The Justice Department on Sunday confirmed an incident involving a drone flying over the Melbour… [+948 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Thousands run against 'dictatorship' in Thai capital
articles.description: Thousands of anti-government protesters have taken part in the "Run Against Dictatorship" in the Thai capital in the biggest political demonstration in years
articles.content:
Last years general election was meant to restore full democracy, five years after the military staged the coup. But the poll rules were widely seen as favoring the pro-military party.
The governments sluggish economic performance has added to a growing sense… [+1932 chars]

articles.author: Rami Musa | AP
articles.title: Hifter's forces say they'll abide by Libya ceasefire deal
articles.description: Libya's east-based forces have announced that they will abide by a Russia- and Turkey-brokered ceasefire starting Sunday, in a last-minute reversal
articles.content:
Hifters eastern-based forces launched a fresh offensive to take the capital in April, sparking a flurry of diplomatic efforts to try to contain the crisis in the North African nation.
Earlier this week, Turkish President Recep Tayep Erdogan and his Russian c… [+1146 chars]

articles.author: Nick Perry | AP
articles.title: Australian village ready for 'The Beast' to burn on through
articles.description: With wildfires threatening their town for more than a week, many people in Burragate have had enough
articles.content:
Id prefer it not to come, but if its going to come, stop teasing, said resident Joe Seamons, who has taken to describing whats officially called the Border Fire as The Beast.
Resident Joe Alvaro put it more bluntly. I just want to get it bloody over and done… [+3158 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Taiwan leader meets top US official after her election win
articles.description: Whom do you meet the morning after winning reelection as leader of Taiwan? If you're Tsai Ing-wen, it's the Americans
articles.content:
Brent Christensen, a U.S. diplomat who is director of the American Institute in Taiwan, congratulated Tsai on her win and she thanked him for his support in a meeting at the presidential office loaded with symbolism.
Tsai has sought to deepen relations with … [+632 chars]
